reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Chen explains complex concepts clearly. Her enthusiasm for physics is contagious.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Lectures are informative but can be dry. More interactive sessions would be beneficial.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Exceptional teacher! Dr. Williams makes biology fascinating and is always willing to help.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Struggles to explain difficult concepts. Often seems unprepared for lectures.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Engaging lecturer with practical examples. Sometimes assigns too much reading.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Passionate about literature. Discussions in class are thought-provoking and enriching.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but can be intimidating. Lab sessions are well-organized.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Clear explanations of economic theories. Could use more real-world applications.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Excellent teacher who makes programming accessible. Always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Tends to ramble and go off-topic. Grading seems arbitrary at times.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Engaging discussions on social issues. Heavy workload but very rewarding.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Knowledgeable about art but lectures can be monotonous. Good use of visual aids.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about sustainability. Field trips greatly enhance the learning experience.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Balanced presentation of political ideologies. Encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Interesting subject matter but can be confusing. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Brings real-world experience to the classroom. Group projects are challenging but valuable.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Fascinating lectures on human cultures. Dr. Thompson is approachable and supportive.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Seems disinterested in teaching. Assignments are unclear and feedback is minimal.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Complex material explained well. More hands-on activities would be appreciated.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable about the subject but not the most engaging speaker. Field trips are informative.
